title: Luxury 1X1 With a Garden View @ Alexander Luxury Living
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Conveniently located between The Woodlands and Spring, TX, Alexander Apartments is a peaceful, quiet community within reach of the major metropolitan Houston area.', 'Our luxury one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in Spring, Texas, feature crown molding, built-in bookshelves, oval garden tubs and fully equipped kitchens.', 'Our residences have the convenience of nearby hiking trails, shopping, restaurants and more.', 'Amenities at Alexander Apartments include a resort-style pool with ample seating for you to take in the sun’s rays, as well as a fitness center that has been fully upgraded with new machines, televisions and free weights.', 'We even have an indoor basketball court for fitness and sports aficionados.', 'Our newly remodeled resident clubhouse is sure to please as well, as it features generous seating options, a modern, self-automated packaging center and friendly staff that is always ready to meet residents’ needs.', 'On the apartment grounds, you’ll find meticulously maintained landscaping, as well as a koi pond that residents enjoy.', 'A maintenance team is always on call to address any issues.', 'If you’re a pet owner, you’ll be happy to know we are a pet-friendly apartment community and even have a dog park for your four-legged friends to enjoy.', 'Several breeds of cats and dogs are accepted and there are two allowed per home.', 'With so many nearby attractions and outdoor recreational areas, both everyone will be happy living at Alexander.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'September 6, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Knightvest Communities are pet friendly communities.', 'We implement a 2 pet limit per apartment home.', 'The following policy is in place to assist in maintaining a healthy and attractive community.', 'Please contact the Management office in the event you have any questions concerning this policy.', 'NOT APPROVED - but not limited to:- Pit Bull Terriers - Staffordshire Terriers - Rottweilers- German Shepherd - Presa Canarios - Chows Chows- Doberman Pinschers - Akitas - Wolf-hybrids-', 'Mastiffs - Cane Corsos - Great Danes- Alaskan Malamutes - Siberian HuskiesIncluding any mix of the breeds listed above.', 'Deposit:', '0', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,4 months,5 months,6 months,7 months,8 months,9 months,10 months,11 months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'Parking type:', 'Parking notes:',
